item.description:
Type 9 Peacemaker Workshop - Also, How to Relate to 9s
Learn all about 9s and strengths, defenses, limitations. Learn about all the subtypes of 9, personal growth strategies, relationship dynamics in relationship to 9s. Great to attend if you are in relationship with a 9 or just want to be more like a 9.

7:30-9:30pm

$40, with sliding scale from $40 to $20 based on ability to pay

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. Counseling, has taught over 2000 Enneagram workshops and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living. He is a therapist for individuals, couples and families and does phone sessions as well as home workshops and trainings in groups and organizations.

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager, Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Type 9 Peacemaker workshop (Open to all types)
